price: 124. Mpe oyo akoboya bokundoli bwa ngai, ya soló, ye akozalaka na bomoyi ya mpasi, mpe omokolo mwa suka, tokosekwisa ye miso mazipama,
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَن ذِكۡرِي فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةٗ ضَنكٗا وَنَحۡشُرُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
